item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

9/24/2012's location is:

Prime 16

In addition to being an excellent micro-brew with a dazzling array of new and tasty beers to try, Prime 16 is also home to the most delicious burgers I've ever had. And don't forget to try their sweet potato fries!

The manager is kindly reserving some tables for us at the front of the bar.
Specials go until 7pm. They are:
1/2 drafts
1/2 off wings
1/2 off appetizer pizzas

Please RSVP; for Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

NeilÂ will act as contact and can be reached at 203-928-9907, texting should be fine too.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host (Neil - 203-928-9907) and/or we're most likely one of the largest groups at the Bar on a Monday (at least in the early going).
item.name: Happy Hour 9/24 - Prime 16
